rukus.text: Chto bylo trudneye - sozdat' vas, o vy, otritsayushchiye voskresheniye, ili nebo?! On soyedinil yego raz"yedinonnyye chasti
i podnyal svod, i vozvysil yego nad vami, i sdelal yego rovnym so vsekh storon i sovershennym
On sdelal noch' tomnoy, a den' svetlym
Zatem On rasprostor i podgotovil zemlyu, chtoby yeyo obitateli mogli na ney zhit'
i izvol iz neyo vodu, zastaviv istochniki bit' klyuchom, i sozdal reki, i vzrastil na ney rasteniya, sluzhashchiye pishchey dlya lyudey i skota
i vozdvig gory
Vso eto - dlya vashey pol'zy i pol'zy vashego skota
Kogda zhe nastanet voskreseniye, uzhasy kotorogo okhvatyat vsekh i vso
tot Den', kogda chelovek vspomnit vse svoi deyaniya: blagochestivyye ili nechestivyye
I geyenna budet yasno pokazana vsem, kto vidit, - vot ono vozdayaniye
tomu, kto prestupil predely dozvolennogo, oslushavshis' Allakha
otdavaya predpochteniye prekhodyashchey zemnoy zhizni
pribezhishchem budet tol'ko pylayushchiy ogon'
A tomu, kto boyalsya velichiya i mogushchestva svoyego Gospoda i uderzhival svoyu dushu ot nechestivykh strastey
pribezhishchem budut rayskiye sady, i nichto drugoye
Sprashivayut tebya, o Mukhammad, o Sudnom chase: "Kogda zhe on nastanet
Ty ne znayesh', kogda on nastanet, chtoby soobshchit' im ob etom
Tol'ko tvoy Gospod', a nikto drugoy, tochno znayet, kogda on nastanet
Tvoy dolg uveshchevat' tekh, kto boitsya yego, a ne soobshchit', kogda on nastanet
V Den', kogda oni uvidyat Sudnyy chas, im pokazhetsya, chto ikh zemnaya zhizn' prodolzhalas' tol'ko odin vecher ili odno utro
